objects.text:
• Official Disney-inspired design
• Premium vinyl material
• Easy peel-and-stick application

product_details.name: Classic Disney Mickey Mouse Wall Art Decal - Premium Vinyl Sticker
product_details.description:
• ✨ Official Disney-inspired classic cartoon artwork design
• 🎨 High-quality vinyl material with vibrant red and black colors
• 📏 Perfect size for room decoration (customizable dimensions available)
• 💪 Durable, fade-resistant, and easy-to-clean surface
• 🏠 Ideal for nurseries, children's rooms, playrooms, or Disney-themed spaces
• 📌 Simple peel-and-stick application with no residue when removed
• 🎯 Precision-cut details ensuring the iconic character's authentic look
• 🌟 Weather-resistant - suitable for both indoor and outdoor use
• ✅ 100% satisfaction guaranteed with authentic design elements
• 🎁 Makes a perfect gift for Disney fans and collectors

banner_details:
The banner is a vibrant and playful promotional design split vertically into two sections. The left half features a deep blue gradient background layered with soft transparent circles in red and navy, providing a lively backdrop. The right half has a warm yellow gradient that showcases the product graphic.

The heading text layer (`heading`) in bold white typography stands out near the top-left. Below it, the subheading (`subheading`) uses a bright yellow, followed by a red call-to-action message (`tagline`). Informational points (`description`) are listed in white further down. A large price marker (`price`) in white adds attention. A red CTA button (`cta_background`) is labeled with contrasting white text (`cta`). Below it, a yellow urgency message (`urgency_text`) concludes the flow. The right side features a centrally placed image of the product (`product_image`).

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: `#1E5799`
- Sky Blue: `#2989D8`
- Warm Yellow: `#FFD700`
- Light Yellow: `#FFED9E`
- Bright Red: `#FF0000`
- Soft White: `#FFFFFF`
- Charcoal Black (for accents): `#000000`
product_color: The product image features a classic cartoon character with a vibrant color palette that conveys a sense of nostalgia and playfulness. The primary colors used are black (#000000) for the ears, body, and upper part of the character, red (#ED1C24) for the shorts, yellow (#FFD100) for the large shoes, and beige (#FFE7C6) for the face and hands. The colors are cleanly segmented but blend harmoniously, allowing each feature to be clearly defined while maintaining visual unity. The bold contrast between the black and vibrant primary colors makes the character pop, making these tones ideal for an eye-catching advertisement banner.
